Измерение_описание: The built-in measuring module calculates consumption; the data is displayed on the mechanical panel and stored in electronic memory

Отправка_описание: The meter sends readings via GSM/GPRS to the service provider’s server on schedule. The user does not participate in this process
Обработка_описание: The utility company’s server receives the readings, links them to your personal account, and uses them to calculate charges
Контроль_описание: The meter reports its status: low battery, tampering attempts, or transmission errors
